field.label: Enable
field.help: This will activate the OSPF service.

field.label: CARP demote
field.help: Register CARP status monitor. When no neighbors are found, consider this node less attractive. Requires syslog enabled with “Debugging” logging. Incompatible with “Enable CARP Failover”.

field.label: Router ID
field.help: If you have a CARP setup, you may want to configure a router id in case of a conflict.

field.label: Reference Cost
field.help: Adjust the reference cost in Mbps for path calculation, useful when bundling interfaces for higher bandwidth.

field.label: Passive Interfaces
field.help: Select the interfaces where no OSPF packets should be sent.

field.label: Route Redistribution
field.help: Select other routing sources to redistribute to other nodes.

field.label: Redistribution Map
field.help: Route Map to set for Redistribution, can be used to send a specific network as advertisement when it is defined in a Prefix List attached to a Route Map.

field.label: Log Adjacency Changes
field.help: If it should be logged when the topology of the area changes.

field.label: Advertise Default Gateway
field.help: This will send the information that we have a default gateway.

field.label: Always Advertise Default Gateway
field.help: Always sends default gateway information, regardless of availability.

field.label: Advertise Default Gateway Metric
field.help: Allows manipulation of the metric when advertising the default gateway.
